item.title: Walk Through The Forest

item.title: Escape From The Earth
item.description: Single Lyrics: I become immortal Wandering from the earth on the morrow Dried tears without any sorrow If there is light I’ll just follow All is meaningless If consciousness can live without substance I’ll never know who I am Never know where’s the end I am dust in the universe Can’t escape from the curse Homeless, drown in loneliness I am dust in the universe Can’t escape from the curse
